name: Fika
tagline: The female-focused AI social & dating app
description:
Fika is Vietnam's fastest-growing AI social & dating app, ranking #1 Best Free Dating App on Google Play and #4 Lifestyle App on App Store in Vietnam and has since pre-launch in November 2020 gained over 1 million downloads. Fika closed the first funding round of $1.6M in October 2021, backed by leading global VCs and angel investors.
Fika is not like other dating apps, but takes a full-journey approach in 4 steps:
1. Knowing yourself (through Fika's self-growth feature)
2. Knowing what you want (through Fika's compatibility feature and content)
3. Finding the person in a safe, authentic environment in Fika - with 100% verified users
4. Continue the relationship in Fika's Couples Version
Wanna know more? Download Fika
